story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Cooper Industries Ltd. CBE.N, a diversified maker of electrical products, said on Wednesday it bought privately held WPI Interconnect Products for $74.5 million. WPI makes customized connectors and cable assembly products for military, industrial and commercial uses, Cooper said. It had sales of $61 million in its most recent fiscal year. The acquisition is part of Cooper's strategy to expand into highly specialized product lines to broaden its existing businesses, the company said.
story.title: cooper pays $ 74 . 5 million for wpi interconnect
